title: Ticket #1070: Gridftp client library misuse in nordugrid_gahp
description: When we added connection reuse to the nordugrid_gahp, we introduced a misuse of of the gridftp client library. When reusing a connection, you can't copy the associated globus_ftp_client_handle_t from one variable to another. Although this datatype is a pointer to a struct globus_i_ftp_client_handle_t, the struct ends up containing the value of the globus_ftp_client_handle_t when initialized. I believe this is the cause of some crashes I've seen recently. Fixing the problem stops the crashing.
